title: Exemptions
context: ยง121-2 Exemptions. The following are exempt from military duty: all persons exempted from military duty under the laws of the United States, all judges of the several courts, and the members of the legislature. [L 1967, c 196, pt of ยง1; HRS ยง121-2] Revision Note Reference to &ldquo;magistrates&rdquo; following &ldquo;judges&rdquo;, deleted as unnecessary in view of L 1970, c 188.
